issues.description: The BroadcastChannel fallback (tabsync.js) is created but not actively used by the Blazor components. The StudentChat.razor relies solely on SignalR for synchronization. Consider integrating BroadcastChannel as a true fallback when SignalR connection fails.

The isSending flag prevents duplicate submissions from the same tab, but there's no server-side idempotency check. If a user rapidly clicks send from multiple tabs before the first request completes, duplicate messages could be created. Consider adding a client-side debounce or server-side idempotency key.
